00049 void DataSetHeaderWriterTest::WriteTest()
00050 {
00051         std::ofstream os;
00052     std::string f = "data_dataGroup_header";
00053     Fs::aptOpen(os, f, std::ios::out|std::ios::binary|std::ios::trunc);
00054     if (!os.is_open())
00055         {
00056                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(0);
00057         }
00058         else
00059         {
00060                 DataSetHeader hdr;
00061                 hdr.SetName(L"xyz123");
00062                 hdr.AddAsciiColumn(L"xyz", 128);
00063                 hdr.AddIntColumn(L"123");
00064                 hdr.SetRowCnt(3);
00065                 writer->Write(os, hdr);
00066                 CPPUNIT_ASSERT(1);
00067                 os.close();
00068         }
00069 
00070         //TODO: use data dataGroup header reader to read header and verify data
00071 }
